items.title: Café de olla
items.description: The most beloved recipe in San Miguel: coffee brewed with cinnamon and piloncillo. It wakes you up and, somehow, wakes up your soul too. No refill!

items.title: Café Puerto Vallarta
items.description: Espresso with coconut cream and steamed milk.

items.title: Black coffee
items.description: Bold, strong, and proud, just like the high-altitude beans from Chiapas (grown at 5,500 ft) that give it its character.Refill available!

items.title: Café lechero
items.description: Steamed milk poured over espresso with a flourish that’s almost as satisfying as drinking it. Almost.

items.title: Decaf coffee
items.description: Gentle in caffeine, rich in flavor. For when you want the ritual without the buzz. Refill available!

items.title: Espresso
items.description: Extraordinary beans. Extraordinary baristas. Extraordinary, period.

items.title: Machine-brewed americano
items.description: A long espresso, the kind that gets the wheels turning, whether it’s for ideas, work, or just because you can.  No refill!

items.title: Capuchino
items.description: A delicious balance of equal-parts between coffee and milk, made with gourmet coffee grains.

items.title: Atole Doña Mary
items.description: Our guests call it “muy muy sabrosísimo. We call it the ”perfect excuse” to dunk a gordita Doña Mary or a piece of sweet bread.

items.title: Latte Coffee
items.description: Rich espresso, silky milk and skilled hands come together in a latte that’s smooth, balanced and crafted with care.

items.title: Hot chocolate
items.description: Made with a Tapatío chocolate recipe passed down for three generations. Like drinking a family tradition.
